title: [HOLD for payment 2024-10-25] [$250]  Web - Search (Expenses) - Inconsistent expense report detail window size after sending message
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.chat.expensify.com
2. Click on search icon
3. Select expenses and open one expense report from a workspace
4. Observe that the expense report is opened as a RHN
5. Send a message in the report and observe the report is still shown as an RHN
6. Change the category in the report then send messgae
7. Observe that the expense report detail is now shown as full screen rather than as RHN

Expected result: Expense report detail view should be consistent

Actual result: None
